attributes.action: replace public street bins with four compartment recycle bins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to urge the Prime Minister to consider the replacement of standard street bins supplied by local authorities with a quadruple (four) compartment recycle bin as is already common in Germany. For example, the containers could be named: 1) Plastics, 2) Paper, 3) Glass, and 4) Residual Waste.
